Title: The Slump
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Prentice Penny, Lesley Arfin (executive story editor), Gil Ozeri (executive story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: With a backlog of unsolved cases, Jake finds himself in a slump. Meanwhile, Amy is put in charge of the Junior Police Program for at risk kids, but her efforts to inspire them fall flat.
